item.description:
LADIES SPA NIGHT!

Free Chair Massage, Skin Care, Makeovers, aromatherapy and Hand Treatments, etc.

Pamper yourself for a change! The team at Look At Me Now is inviting us to their wellness center on Friday 2/13 at 7pm. According to the owner, Lori "We want to give women the chance to relax, rejuvenate and â€œbe pampered for a couple hours. Women spend so much time giving! Events like the spa night help give women their sexy back and rejuvinate them".


This is their website which includes directions. www.lookatmenow22.com
Feel free to call them if you have any questions. 203-933-2200 Limited Space - Register Now by calling the center.

SEE YOU THERE!

Contact:
Lori - 933-2200
item.name: Ladies Spa Night
